characters.story: To leave bird departing questions "Lee? Going away?" curiously detaching!
Fowl birds on person question "Chin? What birds?" curiously - captured fowl!
Peppery standing offends, singing "Shin!" bitterly - 8th stem pungent and laborious!
To manage two peppery commands "Ban!" sharply - handling affairs!
To dispute words pepper commands "Bian!" sharply - arguing and debating!
Partition earth peppery commands "Bee!" sharply - wall as rampart!
To evade walk partition yells "Bee!" sharply - fleeing and hiding!
New standing tree ax sings "Shin!" cheerfully fresh and newly made!
Fuel grass new sings "Shin!" cheerfully - firewood and salary burning!
Relatives stand tree see sing "Chin!" cheerfully - dear and intimate relations!
Inner garments clothes relatives command "Chen!" sharply - underwear beneath!
Good fortune hands bound command "Shing!" sharply - lucky and fortunate!
To clench fortune hand questions "Zhi? Grasping?" tenaciously holding!
Newspaper fortune strike commands "Bao!" sharply - announcing reports!
To call mouth compare commands "Jiao!" sharply - shouting orders!
To receive hand again sings "Show!" cheerfully accepting - income collected!
Land mound solid commands "Loo!" sharply - continental shore!
Force land strike yells "Shi!" sharply - powerful influence!
